price: 24. Pas Firauną (Faroaną), Hamaną ir Karūną (Korah), tačiau jie vadino (jį): „Burtininkas, melagis.“
arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَهَٰمَٰنَ وَقَٰرُونَ فَقَالُواْ سَٰحِرٞ كَذَّابٞ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ilā fir'ʿawna wahāmāna waqārūna faqālū sāḥirun kadhābun
